channel.title: Datavisualisation on Discoveries of an Adventure-R

item.title: First -real- article and entry for r/dataisbeautiful DataViz Battle
item.description: About this project As first article on this R, datascience and dataviz dedicated blog, I present to you my entry for the DataViz battle of January 2018. The rules can be find in the link. Data This month, the data source is a .htm webpage containing several algae growthrates for several light and temperature conditions. How I work on this For this project I used : R for Data importation Data wrangling and cleaning Model analysis Tableau Data exploration Generate the data dashboard So letâ€™s start with R !
